plan: This plan is designed to gradually build your endurance and climbing ability to prepare you for the challenging Himalayan terrain. The focus will be on increasing ride duration and elevation gain, incorporating rest days for recovery, and gradually intensifying the workouts as the month progresses.

day_wise.title: Rest Day
day_wise.description: Take a complete rest to recover from previous rides.

day_wise.title: Endurance Ride
day_wise.description: Long steady ride to build endurance.

day_wise.title: Hill Repeats
day_wise.description: Intense hill repeats to build climbing strength.

day_wise.title: Recovery Ride
day_wise.description: Easy ride to aid recovery.

day_wise.description: Ride at a challenging but sustainable pace.
